alert.note: Alert for Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 11 at 2:00PM MST until January 13 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM MST SATURDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow has tapered off or come to an end, so the Advisory has been cancelled. For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches, with locally higher amounts possible. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph. * WHERE...Gore and Elk Mountains/Central Mountain Valleys and West Elk and Sawatch Mountains. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 5 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 40 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains
